name: MKMapSize
desc: Width and height information on a two-dimensional map projection.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a map size that represents an empty area on a two-dimensional projection of a map.

items.name: init(width: Double, height: Double)
items.desc: Creates a map size that represents an area on a two-dimensional projection of a map with the specified width and height.

items.name: static let world: MKMapSize
items.desc: The width and height, in map points, of the world in a two-dimensional map projection.

items.name: var height: Double
items.desc: The height of the specified area, measured in map points.

items.name: var width: Double
items.desc: The width of the specified area, measured in map points.

items.name: func MKMapSizeEqualToSize(MKMapSize, MKMapSize) -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value indicating whether the two map sizes are equal.

items.name: func MKStringFromMapSize(MKMapSize) -> String
items.desc: Returns a formatted string for the specified map size.
